Posts.Content: I too took Arimidex in 2004 after having a mastectomy, full chemo & 30 sessions of radiation treatment. The hot flushes were the worst & I can remember having 21 in one day! Other than that I sailed through my treatment & was so grateful for being prescribed Arimidex ... even though it was for 5 years. I too would say, if offered ... take it ... you have everything to gain! Report
Posts.Title: I like Arimidex
